response.overview: Camel's second studio album, Mirage, originally released in 1974, returns in a 2023 remastered and expanded edition. This release features a newly remastered original stereo mix by Ben Wiseman, alongside fresh stereo and 5.1 surround sound mixes crafted by Stephen W. Tayler. The immersive surround mix brings renewed clarity and depth to the band's intricate compositions, highlighting standout tracks like "Lady Fantasy" and "Nimrodel/The Procession/The White Rider." Additionally, the edition includes seven bonus tracks from 1973 demo sessions and an illustrated booklet with an essay, offering a comprehensive experience for progressive rock enthusiasts.
response.title: Camel - Mirage (2023 Remaster)
